meanings.sent1: The young child was nescient of the dangers that lay ahead.
meanings.sent2: She felt nescient about the subject and decided to ask for help.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed nescient of the fact that it was being watched.
meanings.sent4: His nescient approach to the task led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent5: The nescient explorer wandered into the forest without a map.

meanings.sent1: The nescient villagers had never seen such advanced technology.
meanings.sent2: He was nescient of the customs of the foreign land he visited.
meanings.sent3: The nescient student thought the answer was obvious, but it wasn't.
meanings.sent4: Her nescient behavior in the city drew unwanted attention.
meanings.sent5: The nescient driver struggled to understand the road signs.
